name: trivy
description: Trivy is the world's most popular open source vulnerability and misconfiguration scanner. It is reliable, fast, extremely easy to use, and it works wherever you need it.
author: Aqua Security

inputs.name: aquaPlatform
inputs.label: Aqua Security Platform
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the Aqua Security Platform service connection.

inputs.name: method
inputs.label: Trivy Run Method
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify how Trivy should be executed:</br>`install` to download Trivy from GitHub releases</br>`docker` to run Trivy as Docker container</br>`system` to use pre-installed Trivy executable.

inputs.name: image
inputs.label: Trivy Docker Image
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify a custom Trivy Docker image to use. If set, the `version` option is ignored.

inputs.name: version
inputs.label: Trivy Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the version of Trivy to use. Ignored if a custom Trivy Docker image is specified.

inputs.name: options
inputs.label: Trivy Options
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide additional command-line options to pass to the Trivy executable.

inputs.name: type
inputs.label: Scan Type
inputs.helpMarkDown: The type of scan to perform.

inputs.name: target
inputs.label: Scan Target
inputs.helpMarkDown: The specified target will be scanned using selected scan type.

inputs.name: scanners
inputs.label: Security scanners
inputs.helpMarkDown: Choose which scanners to run. Default depends on scant type.

inputs.name: severities
inputs.label: Security severities
inputs.helpMarkDown: Severities of security issues to be displayed. Default depends on scant type.

inputs.name: ignoreScanErrors
inputs.label: Ignore Scan errors
inputs.helpMarkDown: Ignore scan errors and continue the pipeline with `SucceededWithIssues` result.

inputs.name: reports
inputs.label: Generate Additional Reports
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select additional reports to generate. JSON report is always generated.

inputs.name: publish
inputs.label: Publish reports as artifacts
inputs.helpMarkDown: Publish generated reports as pipeline artifacts.

inputs.name: templates
inputs.label: Report Templates Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify a custom directory containing templates for the ASFF, HTML, JUnit reports. If not set, will lookup in the `contrib` directory of the Trivy installation.
